tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Much better of a professor than Dr Burns, so you can actually learn the content. Despite not getting much out of E1 and having sub optimal circuit analysis skills, I felt E2 was pretty easy. The tests are fair and very similar to hw. Only thing to beware of: Tang grades on a normalized bell curve, so the class average becomes the cutoff for a C.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I was not going to review Dr. Tang but wanted to warn others to get ready for the hardest weeks after Thanksgiving. There were 3 homework assignments, a group project, 2 very difficult labs and then the final. I had a B going into this but with 40% of the grade being decided in the last two weeks my grade dropped. Very difficult last few weeks

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Hua Tang explained what we were supposed to learn in E1 class in a matter of 2 days. His ability to present the material in an understanding way other than just "cause reasons" is excellent. The tests are fair as long as you study sufficiently. Circuit analysis skills are required heavily (much more than E1). Take his class!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: If you show up and do the homework the class shouldn\'t be that bad. Test are fair and he grades with iron fist.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: DO NOT MISS A LECTURE! He teaches very fast, but goes over it many times. If you have Dr. Burns or Dr. Yang for E1 then this class will be easy. A lot of the material is the same just a little more in depth. He is a very good teacher, he can be a harsh grader on the tests but they are open notes so they are doable. I\'d take him again.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Though he is foreign, he speaks English very well. Course material was somewhat difficult but Dr. Tang was amazing at explaining it so that I could understand. Very approachable and willing to help you if you ask him questions. Tests could throw a curve ball at times but weren\'t awful.
